groovyx.caelyf.logging
[Groovy] Class GroovyLogger

java.lang.Object
  groovyx.caelyf.logging.GroovyLogger

class GroovyLogger

Simple wrapper for java.util.logging.Logger. This logger can log correct class/method names even if used in Groovy.

Implementation idea found here.

Authors:
ksky@jggug.org (original implementation)
Guillaume Laforge (minor groovyfications and comments)

Constructor Detail

GroovyLogger

GroovyLogger(String name, boolean groovletOrTemplate = false)
Groovy-friendly logger.
Parameters:
name - the name of the logger
groovletOrTemplate - false by default, but can be set to true to say it's a logger for templates or groovlets
